entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this morning. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Rainfall amount 5 mm. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to light snow before morning. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
